name: G2A Remove Body Clicker
description: Hides body clicker so when clicking the background you aren't redirected.  Changes background to black.  Slightly raises position where games are shown to remove dead space.

user.name: ir0nfist
user.about: I sometimes put up fixes for annoyances I find in websites I use.  Just so others don't have to take the time to do it.  That's about it.
